title: Explore
summary: Visualize and explore available datasets relating to Bicyling and Walking traffic, safety, and demographics.

title: Safety
summary: Discover areas with the greatest safety risk for bicyclists and pedestrians within Santa Barbara County and how safety trends have changed over time.

title: Infrastructure
summary: Locate existing bicycling and walking infrastructure in Santa Barbara County and identify gaps in the roadway network.

title: Equity
summary: Identify key areas where equitable access to safe pedestrian and bicycle routes can be improved so all Santa Barbara County residents can partake in active transporation.
